name: SpaceChaos
description:
SpaceChaos is a indie 2D space shooter game, written in Java with libGDX and full Open Source.

The target is simple:  Survive! Survive as long as possible.

The control is trivial, too. The shuttle is following your mouse and you can shoot with your space bar and left / right mouse buttons.

The game was developed in 2017 and has already finished.

Release date was 26.11.2017 .

Release Notes: https://github.com/opensourcegamedev/SpaceChaos/releases

Code: https://github.com/opensourcegamedev/SpaceChaos

Download: https://github.com/opensourcegamedev/SpaceChaos/releases/download/v1.2.0/SpaceCh...
